entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this morning. Rain beginning this morning. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Showers or drizzle. Low 7.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Monday 1 May 2023
